components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: THE CRUISE CONTROL LIGHT FLASHED ON AND OFF. THEN, THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY ACCELERATED. DRIVER APPLIED THE BRAKES IN ORDER TO STOP.  FOLLOWING THAT A LOUD CLANKING NOISE WAS HEARD, AND VEHICLE STALLED.  DRIVER TRIED TO RESTART VEHICLE, BUT WAS UNABLE TO DO SO. DRIVER HAD THE VEHICLE TOWED TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION, AND  MECHANIC DETERMINED THAT THE ENGINE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *AK
